mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT(SUB_YEAR) FROM HD_SUBJECT_TB A JOIN (SELECT SUB_CODE FROM HD_CLASS_TB WHERE PROF_ID = #{profId}) B ON(A.SUB_CODE = B.SUB_CODE)
SELECT a.SUB_NAME, a.sub_code FROM HD_SUBJECT_TB A JOIN (SELECT SUB_CODE FROM HD_CLASS_TB WHERE PROF_ID = #{profId}) B ON(A.SUB_CODE = B.SUB_CODE)

SELECT * FROM (SELECT SUB_CODE , (SELECT SUB_YEAR FROM HD_SUBJECT_TB WHERE SUB_CODE=#{subCode}) AS SUB_YEAR, (SELECT SUB_SEMESTER FROM HD_SUBJECT_TB WHERE SUB_CODE=#{subCode}) AS SUB_SEME, (SELECT PROF_NAME FROM HD_PROFESSOR_TB WHERE PROF_ID = #{profId}) AS PROF_NAME, (SELECT PHONE FROM HD_PROFESSOR_TB WHERE PROF_ID=#{profId}) AS PHONE, (SELECT SUB_DATE FROM HD_SUBJECT_TB WHERE SUB_CODE=#{subCode} AND PROF_ID=#{profId}) AS SUB_DATE, (SELECT SUB_TIME FROM HD_SUBJECT_TB WHERE SUB_CODE=#{subCode} AND PROF_ID=#{profId}) AS SUB_TIME, (SELECT SUB_ROOM FROM HD_SUBJECT_TB WHERE SUB_CODE=#{subCode} AND PROF_ID=#{profId}) AS SUB_ROOM, (SELECT BOOK_NAME FROM HD_SUBJECT_TB WHERE SUB_CODE=#{subCode} AND PROF_ID=#{profId}) AS BOOK_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM HD_SUB_REQ_TB WHERE SUB_CODE =#{subCode} AND PROF_ID=#{profId} )) AS CAPACITY
FROM HD_CLASS_TB WHERE SUB_CODE = #{subCode} AND PROF_ID=#{profId})

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ORI.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HD_ATTENDANCE_TB WHERE STU_NO = ORI.STU_NO AND STATUS='출석') AS ATTEND, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HD_ATTENDANCE_TB WHERE STU_NO = ORI.STU_NO AND STATUS='결석') AS DISMISS, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HD_ATTENDANCE_TB WHERE STU_NO = ORI.STU_NO AND STATUS='지각') AS LATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HD_ATTENDANCE_TB WHERE STU_NO = ORI.STU_NO AND STATUS='조퇴') AS EALRY_LEAVE
FROM (SELECT STU_NO, SUB_CODE, PROF_ID,GRADE , STU_NAME, DEPT_CODE, DEPT_NAME, ACA_YEAR_SEM,
(SELECT SUB_YEAR AS SY FROM HD_SUBJECT_TB B WHERE A.SUB_CODE = B.SUB_CODE) AS SUB_YEAR, (SELECT SUB_SEMESTER AS SS FROM HD_SUBJECT_TB B WHERE A.SUB_CODE = B.SUB_CODE) AS SUB_SEMESTER
FROM HD_SUB_REQ_TB A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT(STU_NO) AS STN, STU_NAME, DEPT_CODE, SUBSTR(STU_YEAR_SEM , 1,1) AS GRADE ,(SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM HD_DEPARTMENT_TB A WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = B1.DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_NAME FROM HD_STUDENT_TB B1 LEFT JOIN HD_SUB_REQ_TB USING(STU_NO) ) B ON (A.STU_NO = B.STN) WHERE 1 = 1
AND SUB_CODE = #{subCode}
AND PROF_ID = #{profId} ) ORI )
WHERE 1 = 1
WHERE 1 = 2

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT ORI.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HD_ATTENDANCE_TB WHERE STU_NO = ORI.STU_NO AND STATUS='출석') AS ATTEND, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HD_ATTENDANCE_TB WHERE STU_NO = ORI.STU_NO AND STATUS='결석') AS DISMISS, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HD_ATTENDANCE_TB WHERE STU_NO = ORI.STU_NO AND STATUS='지각') AS LATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HD_ATTENDANCE_TB WHERE STU_NO = ORI.STU_NO AND STATUS='조퇴') AS EALRY_LEAVE
FROM (SELECT STU_NO, SUB_CODE, PROF_ID,GRADE , STU_NAME, DEPT_CODE, DEPT_NAME, ACA_YEAR_SEM,
(SELECT SUB_YEAR AS SY FROM HD_SUBJECT_TB B WHERE A.SUB_CODE = B.SUB_CODE) AS SUB_YEAR, (SELECT SUB_SEMESTER AS SS FROM HD_SUBJECT_TB B WHERE A.SUB_CODE = B.SUB_CODE) AS SUB_SEMESTER
FROM HD_SUB_REQ_TB A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT(STU_NO) AS STN, STU_NAME, DEPT_CODE, SUBSTR(STU_YEAR_SEM , 1,1) AS GRADE ,(SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM HD_DEPARTMENT_TB A WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = B1.DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_NAME FROM HD_STUDENT_TB B1 LEFT JOIN HD_SUB_REQ_TB USING(STU_NO) ) B ON (A.STU_NO = B.STN) WHERE 1 = 1
AND SUB_CODE = #{subCode}
AND PROF_ID = #{profId} ) ORI )
WHERE 1 = 1
WHERE 1 = 2
